alert.note: Alert for Austin; Brazos; Inland Harris; Waller; Washington (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 05 at 8:24PM CDT by NWS Houston - Galveston
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Austin, southern Grimes, southeastern Brazos, eastern Washington, western Montgomery, northwestern Waller and northwestern Harris Counties through 900 PM CDT... At 824 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles southwest of Hempstead, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Brenham, Navasota, Hempstead, Prairie View, Bellville, Washington, Pine Island and Todd Mission. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.

area.areaDesc: Austin; Brazos; Inland Harris; Waller; Washington
